name: The Settlers 4: Trojans and the Elixir of Power
name_original: The Settlers 4: Trojans and the Elixir of Power
description:
The Settlers 4: Trojans and the Elixir of Power is a strategy game developed by Blue Byte. It came out on 01-03-2002. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play The Settlers 4: Trojans and the Elixir of Power on PC.
